SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BBS.BBS_ID) AS ROWNUM, BBS.BBS_ID, COD.CODE_NAME, BBS.BBS_SUBJECT, COUNT(REP.REPLY_ID) AS REPLY_CNT, BBS.HIT_CNT, MEM.MEMBER_NAME , BBS.REG_DTTM FROM EDU.BBS AS BBS
INNER JOIN EDU.MEMBERS AS MEM
ON BBS.REG_ID = MEM.MEMBER_ID
INNER JOIN EDU.CODE AS COD
ON BBS.BBS_TYPE = COD.CODE
LEFT OUTER JOIN EDU.REPLY AS REP
ON REP.BBS_ID = BBS.BBS_ID AND REP.USE_YN != 'N'
WHERE BBS.USE_YN != 'N'
AND BBS.BBS_TYPE = '01'
AND BBS.BBS_TYPE = '02'
AND BBS.BBS_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchWord} , '%')
AND BBS.BBS_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchWord} , '%')
AND (BBS.BBS_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchWord} , '%') OR BBS.BBS_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchWord} , '%'))
GROUP BY BBS.BBS_ID, COD.CODE_NAME, BBS.BBS_SUBJECT, BBS.HIT_CNT, MEM.member_name, BBS.REG_DTTM ORDER BY BBS.BBS_ID DESC LIMIT #{pageLength} OFFSET ( COALESCE(#{page}::integer, 1) -1) * #{pageLength}
